presentation.label: SMTP
presentation.description:
This presentation is designed to monitor a specified channel and treat it as a flag to indicate whether or not to trigger an email being sent to a SMTP server.
The generic intention of the email presentation is to be used with the transform device performing a calculation or a group of comparisons. If the conditions are met, an email message will be queued, provided the SMTP presentation was configured to monitor the transform device.

setting.label: Monitored channel
setting.tooltip: Channel containing the condition (usually a channel generated with the Transforms device) to perform the e-mail call.

setting.label: Server address
setting.tooltip: The IP address of the SMTP server.

setting.label: To address
setting.tooltip: The email address to send the email to.

setting.label: From address
setting.tooltip: The from address of the email.

setting.label: Server Port
setting.tooltip: The port of the SMTP server.
